alt.description: This attribute defines the alternative text describing the image.

color.description: The background color of the avatar if not using a src url. Should be a hex color string. Color is a random color if not specified.

gap.description: Letter type unit distance between left and right sides.

icon.description: Name of an React-Icon (See all icons) or properties of an Icon block to use an icon in avatar.

size.description: Size of the avatar; default, small, large or responsive.

src.description: The address of the image for an image avatar.

style.description: Css style object to applied to avatar.

onClick.description: Triggered when avatar item is clicked.
